subject: Baseball
Anti-Semitism
lead_paragraph: Delmon Young of the Detroit Tigers was arrested in New York on Friday and charged with aggravated harassment after a confrontation in which he screamed anti-Semitic epithets, the police said.
snippet: Delmon Young of the Detroit Tigers was arrested in New York on Friday and charged with aggravated harassment after a confrontation in which he screamed anti-Semitic epithets, the police said.
